COMMENT_TX: $the ball fell between Bibb Falk, Spencer Harris and Everett Scott
$Spencer Harris ran into the crowd on the field
$Bill Barrett injured his knee on the play
$Ty Cobb rounded 3B too far and was tagged; 3B Umpire Dick Nallin allowed Cobb to remain at 3B because Nallin got in Cobb's way
$when the ball disappeared from the sight of the umpire back of the stand, Jim Poole was sent back to 3B after apparently scoring
$the game was delayed while the groundskeepers sprinkled the infield
$Ted Blankenship struck on the right thumb, which was broken
$Ray Morehart started to steal then changed his mind
$Gene Robertson forgot the number of outs and headed for 3B
$Johnny Mostil called for interference for running into his own batted ball
$Bill Hunnefield scored while Bob Meusel held the ball
